prompts: Imagine a ghostly Pokemon with a mischievous grin and a shadowy form.
Create a spooky creature that lurks in the dark, featuring purple and red colors.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of fright and stealth, with a playful demeanor.
Generate an eerie Pokemon with sharp claws and a silhouette that blends into shadows.
Show me a ghost-type Pokemon that has a round body and devilish cheeks.
Make a Pokemon that can disappear and reappear, with a focus on dark and vibrant colors.
Give me a spectral Pokemon with a mischievous personality that haunts urban environments.
